snippet: Italy proposed new rules on Friday to prevent the heads of state agencies from holding multiple positions after a scandal involving a conflict of interest for the state pension fund manager....

headline.print_headline: Italy Tightens Rules on State Managers After Scandal
headline.main: Italy Tightens Rules on State Managers After Scandal

lead_paragraph: Italy proposed new rules on Friday to prevent the heads of state agencies from holding multiple positions after a scandal involving a conflict of interest for the state pension fund manager.
